defaultProfiles.name: Department of Land and Natural Resources

defaultData.description: I help protect Hawaii's resources by hiking on sanctioned trails and being safe.

defaultChallenges.title: Beach Clean Up
defaultChallenges.purpose: To clean up Waikiki beach from all of the wear and tear from tourists.
defaultChallenges.instructions: Come to Waikiki Beach anytime between 8 AM to 2 PM to help pick up trash on the sand and in the ocean.

defaultChallenges.title: Koko Head Trail Cleanup
defaultChallenges.purpose: To clean up a highly populated hiking trail and prevent Hawaii's native wildlife from eating any unwanted trash.
defaultChallenges.instructions: Come to Koko Head anytime between 8 AM to 2 PM to help pick up trash on the trail.

defaultChallenges.title: Plating Native Trees
defaultChallenges.purpose: To provide prevent trees that are native to Hawaii from going extinct and keep Hawaii's ecosystem balanced.
defaultChallenges.instructions: Come to Aiea Loop Trail anytime between 9 AM to 1 PM to help plant trees with the Department of Land and Natural Resources.

defaultRewards.title: Free Shave Ice
defaultRewards.description: Redeem your points and get (1) small shave ice for free.
